title: Chapter 979 - Each Displays Their Wondrous Abilities

Chapter 979 - Each Displays Their Wondrous Abilities

Although he seemed a bit pathetic, Huo Yao didn’t seem surprised.

He steadied himself, then laughed. “This treasure must be one of your trump cards, Master! It really is impressive.”

He locked onto the Immortal-Beating Mallet and sighed. “Alas, the treasure might be impressive, but with your cultivation, you’re far from capable of displaying its full strength. Pushing yourself to use it anyway will only drain your cultivation base even faster. You won’t last much longer!”

Su Yi ignored him, gripped the mallet as he might a sword, and charged.

The Immortal-Beating Mallet was a supreme treasure of the Timekeeper, and it was a Xiantian Divine Treasure in its own right. It was emblazoned with the strange and inscrutable power of the darkness of an eternal night.

When he used it as a sword, his force and momentum were far greater than before!

Huo Yao swung his sleeves.

Whoosh!

A blazing, fiery Dao Sword shot forth. The words ‘the Scarlet Dome of Heaven’ were carved on its hilt in characters the size of a fly’s head. The blade was radiant and translucent, and the aura emanating from it set the skies within a ten-thousand-foot radius ablaze.

The Scarlet Dome of Heaven Sword!
